00015 #ifndef __V4ARGS_H__

00018 #include "v4file.h"

00021 enum
00022 {
00023     ARG_TYPE_INT   = 0,
00024     ARG_TYPE_CHAR  = 1,
00025     ARG_TYPE_FLOAT = 2,
00026 };
00027 
00028 typedef struct cmd_arg_t
00029 {
00030     char *name;
00031     char *alias;
00032     char *long_name;
00033     int   type;
00034     void *pvalue;
00035     int   def_value;
00036     char *note;
00037 } cmd_arg_t;
00038 
00039 typedef struct arg_ctx_t
00040 {
00041     cmd_arg_t *args;
00042     int cnt;
00043 } arg_ctx_t;
00044 
00045 static void read_args(arg_ctx_t *ctx, int argc, char *argv[]);
00046 static void print_args(arg_ctx_t *ctx);
00047 static void dump_args(arg_ctx_t *ctx);
00048 
00049 
00050 typedef void read_args_func_t(void *cb, cmd_arg_t *arg, char *value);
00051 static void read_args_notify(arg_ctx_t *ctx, int argc, char *argv[], void *cb, read_args_func_t *func);
00052 
00054 static cmd_arg_t *find_arg(arg_ctx_t *ctx, char *name)
00055 {
00056     cmd_arg_t *arg = NULL;
00057     int i, dash_num;
00058     dash_num = 0;
00059     while ((strlen(name) > 1) && (name[0] == '-'))
00060     {
00061         dash_num += 1;
00062         name += 1;
00063     }
00064     if (dash_num > 0)
00065     {
00066         for (i=0; i<ctx->cnt; i++)
00067         {
00068             if ((strcmp(ctx->args[i].long_name, name) == 0) ||
00069                 (strcmp(ctx->args[i].alias, name) == 0) ||
00070                 (strcmp(ctx->args[i].name, name) == 0))
00071             {
00072                 arg = &ctx->args[i];
00073                 break;
00074             }
00075         }
00076     }
00077     return arg;
00078 }
00079 
00080 static void set_arg_value(cmd_arg_t *arg, char *value, void *cb, read_args_func_t *func)
00081 {
00082     if (!arg) return;
00083     switch (arg->type)
00084     {
00085     case ARG_TYPE_CHAR:
00086         {
00087             char **pchar = (char**)arg->pvalue;
00088             if (value && (strlen(value) > 0) && (value[0] != '-'))
00089             {
00090                 *pchar = value;
00091             }
00092         }
00093         break;
00094     case ARG_TYPE_INT:
00095         {
00096             int *pint = (int*)arg->pvalue;
00097             int ival = value? atoi(value) : arg->def_value;
00098             *pint = ival;
00099         }
00100         break;
00101     case ARG_TYPE_FLOAT:
00102         {
00103             double *pdbl = (double*)arg->pvalue;
00104             double dval = value? atof(value) : (double)arg->def_value;
00105             *pdbl = dval;
00106         }
00107         break;
00108     }
00109     if (func)
00110         func(cb, arg, value);
00111 }
00112 
00113 static void read_args_notify(arg_ctx_t *ctx, int argc, char *argv[], void *cb, read_args_func_t *func)
00114 {
00115     int i;
00116     cmd_arg_t *arg;
00117     cmd_arg_t *prev_arg;
00118     char *prev_val;
00119     prev_arg = NULL;
00120     prev_val = NULL;
00121     for (i=1; i<argc; i++)
00122     {
00123         // find appropriate argument in array
00124         arg = find_arg(ctx, argv[i]);
00125         if (arg)
00126         {
00127             set_arg_value(prev_arg, prev_val, cb, func);
00128             prev_arg = arg;
00129             prev_val = NULL;
00130         }
00131         else
00132         {
00133             if (!prev_val)
00134                 prev_val = argv[i];
00135         }
00136     }
00137     set_arg_value(prev_arg, prev_val, cb, func);
00138 }
00139 
00140 static void read_args(arg_ctx_t *ctx, int argc, char *argv[])
00141 {
00142     read_args_notify(ctx, argc, argv, NULL, NULL);
00143 }
00144 
00145 static void print_args(arg_ctx_t *ctx)
00146 {
00147     cmd_arg_t *arg;
00148     int i;
00149     for (i=0; i<ctx->cnt; i++)
00150     {
00151         arg = &ctx->args[i];
00152         verbose_print(0, "-%s (-%s): [-%s] %s;\n", arg->name, arg->alias, arg->long_name, arg->note);
00153     }
00154 }
00155 
00156 static void dump_args(arg_ctx_t *ctx)
00157 {
00158     cmd_arg_t *arg;
00159     int i;
00160     for (i=0; i<ctx->cnt; i++)
00161     {
00162         arg = &ctx->args[i];
00163         switch (arg->type)
00164         {
00165         case ARG_TYPE_CHAR:
00166             {
00167                 char *sval = *(char**)arg->pvalue;
00168                 if (sval) 
00169                     verbose_print(0, "-%s (-%s) = [%s] %s\n", arg->name, arg->alias, arg->long_name, sval);
00170             }
00171             break;
00172         case ARG_TYPE_INT:
00173             {
00174                 int ival = *(int*)arg->pvalue;
00175                 verbose_print(0, "-%s (-%s) = [%s] %d\n", arg->name, arg->alias, arg->long_name, ival);
00176             }
00177             break;
00178         case ARG_TYPE_FLOAT:
00179             {
00180                 double dval = *(double *)arg->pvalue;
00181                 verbose_print(0, "-%s (-%s) = [%s] %g\n", arg->name, arg->alias, arg->long_name, dval);
00182             }
00183             break;
00184         }
00185     }
00186 }
